item.title: Assistant Director Clark Credle Opens Up About Stroke Recovery, Capturing Legacy of His Hollywood Family
item.description: The descendant of prolific helmer William Beaudine, who worked on such projects as ‘Argo,’ ‘American Sniper’ and ‘Shameless,’ is telling his story in the in-the-works documentary ‘The First Family of
